attributes.action: make provisions for a free society.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Prime Minister must acknowledge complete secularism, and the tenets therein. Make provisions for the complete abolition of organised religion in the long-term, with the intention of creating a wholly free and liberal society. Deism, rather than the adherence to any particular religion, should be encouraged. Encourage the instruction of children based upon secular, non-discriminatory morality.
